means: （用于否定句、疑问句中以及 if 或 whether 和 prevent、ban、avoid 等动词后，代替 something）任何东西

sentence.Network_en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

sentence.Network_en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

sentence.Network_en: "What would you like to eat?" — "Anything'll do me, Eva."
sentence.Network_cn: “你想吃什么？”——“我吃什么都行，伊娃。”

...e）、任何地点（Anywhere）处理与业务相关的任何事情（anything）（Anything），可以摆脱时间和空间对办公人员的束缚，提高工作效率、加 …
初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... anyone pron. 任何人，无论谁 anything pron. 什么事（物）；任何事（物） anyway ad. 不管怎样.

list.abs: 用餐时常用到的英语口语 ... All right.( 明白了。) Anything else?( 还要别的吗?) Will you be eating here?( 您是在这儿吃吗?).
大学英语四级常用词组 ... any more 再；较多些 anything but 除…以外任何事(物) appeal to 上诉.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... anyplace 任何地方 anything but 决不 anything else 别的东西.

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negativeor in questions](informal)added as a general reference to other things similar to the thing mentioned
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)或其他什么的（补充与前面提到的事物相似的事物）

lj.lj_ly: no strings attached, you don't have to join up or anything.
lj.lj_ls: 又没什么条件，你没必要入伍或是其他什么的。

jx.jx_en_mean: By no means; not at all

lj.lj_ly: I was anything but happy about going.

entry.tran: （用于否定句）任何事物，什么事情
entry.def: You use anything in statements with negative meaning to indicate in a general way that nothing is present or that an action or event does not or cannot happen.

example.ex: We can't do anything...
example.tran: 我们什么都做不了。

example.ex: Dad sat, not saying anything...
example.tran: 爸爸坐着，一声不吭。

entry.tran: （用于疑问句或条件从句）任何事物，任何事情
entry.def: You use anything in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about whether something is present or happening.

example.ex: What happened, is anything wrong?...
example.tran: 怎么了，出什么事了吗？

example.ex: Did you find anything?...
example.tran: 你找到什么了吗？

entry.tran: （用于描述所谈论事物的词语前）…的东西，…的事情
entry.def: You can use anything before words which indicate the kind of thing you are talking about.

example.ex: More than anything else, he wanted to become a teacher...
example.tran: 他最想成为一名教师。

example.ex: Anything that's cheap this year will be even cheaper next year...
example.tran: 今年的便宜货明年会更便宜。

entry.tran: （用于加强语气）无论什么东西，随便什么事情
entry.def: You use anything to emphasize a possible thing, event, or situation, when you are saying that it could be any one of a very large number of things.

example.ex: He is young, fresh, and ready for anything...
example.tran: 他年轻又富有朝气，什么事都愿意做。

example.ex: At that point, anything could happen...
example.tran: 那一刻，什么事都可能发生。

entry.def: You use anything in expressions such as anything near ,anything close to and anything like to emphasize a statement that you are making.

example.ex: Doctors have decided the only way he can live anything near a normal life is to give him an operation...
example.tran: 医生的结论是只有做手术，他才有可能过上基本正常的生活。

example.ex: Only Cowans played anything close to his true form...
example.tran: 只有考恩斯算是发挥出了正常水平。

entry.def: When you do not want to be exact, you use anything to talk about a particular range of things or quantities.

example.ex: Factory farming has turned the cow into a milk machine, producing anything from 25 to 40 litres of milk per day...
example.tran: 集约饲养把奶牛变成了生产牛奶的机器，每天差不多要挤出25升到40升的牛奶。

example.ex: Fights with his father lasted anything between fifteen minutes and an hour.
example.tran: 和他父亲争吵了大约15分钟到一个小时。

entry.tran: （用于形容词后表示强调）非常，十分
entry.def: You use as anything after an adjective to emphasize a quality that someone has.

example.ex: He used to be as smart as anything...
example.tran: 他过去聪明绝顶。

example.ex: She opened the door and jumped out, quick as anything.
example.tran: 她打开门，飞快地跳了出来。

entry.tran: 单单除…之外;根本不;远非
entry.def: You use anything but in expressions such as anything but quiet and anything but attractive to emphasize that something is not the case.

example.ex: I will be anything but quiet on Saturday night!...
example.tran: 星期六的晚上我根本静不下心来！

example.ex: There's no evidence that he told anyone to say anything but the truth...
example.tran: 并无证据表明他让什么人隐瞒真相。

entry.def: You can say that you would not do something for anything to emphasize that you definitely would not want to do or be a particular thing.

example.ex: I wouldn't want to move for anything in the world...
example.tran: 就是天塌了我也不搬走。

example.ex: I wouldn't have missed this summer in England for anything...
example.tran: 我本来说什么也不会错过在英格兰的这个夏季的。

entry.tran: （尤用于否定句后，对所说之事进行补充说明）甚至正相反，甚至还不如说
entry.def: You use if anything, especially after a negative statement, to introduce a statement that adds to what you have just said.

example.ex: I never had to clean up after him. If anything, he did most of the cleaning.
example.tran: 我从来不用跟在他后面打扫卫生。恰恰相反，他包揽了大部分的清洁工作。

entry.tran: 或其他什么的；诸如此类
entry.def: You can add or anything to the end of a clause or sentence in order to refer vaguely to other things that are or may be similar to what has just been mentioned.

example.ex: Listen, if you talk to him or anything make sure you let us know, will you...
example.tran: 听着，如果你和他说话或什么的，一定要让我们知道，好吗？

example.ex: He didn't cry or scream or anything.
example.tran: 他没哭也没喊，什么事也没有。

auth_sentence.res_content: You can't do anything without a healthy body.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 任何的, 任何一种, 所有的

stems_affixes.word_buile: any任何的+how怎样→随便怎么样,都……

Sentence.sentence: Second, read a whole paragraph before you mark anything.
Ellen, you should know better than to take Pam's words for anything.
Already there are many alternative fuel vehicles on the market, powered by anything from solar power to natural gas
Do you have anything like that?
It does not really touch on anything serious.
Have they anything specific in mind?

means.word_mean: （用于否定句、疑问句中以及 if 或 whether 和 prevent、ban、avoid 等动词后，代替 something）任何东西，任何事物

sentences.en: I want something to eat; anything will do.
sentences.cn: 我想吃点东西, 随便什么都行。

sentences.en: Do you know anything about that country?
sentences.cn: 你对那个国家了解得多吗?

sentences.en: Is he anything of a statesman?

jushi.english: I want something to eat, anything will do.
jushi.chinese: 我想吃点东西,随便什么都行。
